mapper.update:
UPDATE sell_platform_merchant_prod
sell_platform_id = #{sellPlatformId},
merchant_product_id = #{merchantProductId},
sale_price = #{salePrice},
path = #{path},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE id = #{id}
